source.name: Source Task
source.description: The that streams inputs data into the pipeline.

models.name: No model (Data Source)
models.description: This task does not use any model as it serves as the data source for the pipeline.

object-detection-general.name: Object Detection on general
object-detection-general.description: Detect and localize objects in images using models trained on the COCO dataset.

models.name: YOLOv5n
models.description: A lightweight version of the YOLOv5 architecture, optimized for speed and efficiency while maintaining good accuracy.

models.name: YOLOv5s
models.description: A small version of the YOLOv5 architecture, balancing speed and accuracy for real-time applications.

models.name: YOLOv5m
models.description: A medium-sized version of the YOLOv5 architecture, providing a good trade-off between speed and accuracy for various applications.

face-detection.name: Face Detection
face-detection.description: Detect and localize human faces in images using specialized face detection models.

models.name: RetinaFace on bounding boxes
models.description: An optimized version of the RetinaFace model, designed for efficient face detection within specified bounding boxes.

vehicle-plate-detection.name: License Plate Detection
vehicle-plate-detection.description: Detect and localize vehicle license plates in images using specialized license plate detection models.

models.name: License Plate Detection Model
models.description: A model specifically trained to identify and localize vehicle license plates in various conditions.

vehicle-damage-detection.name: Vehicle Damage Detection
vehicle-damage-detection.description: Detect and localize damages on vehicles in images using specialized vehicle damage detection models.

models.name: Vehicle Damage Detection Model
models.description: A model specifically trained to identify and localize damages on vehicles in various conditions.

protective-gear-detection.name: Protective Gear Detection
protective-gear-detection.description: Detect and localize personal protective equipment (PPE) in images using specialized gear detection models.

models.name: Gear Detection Model
models.description: A model specifically trained to identify and localize gears in various industrial images.

equipment-detection.name: Equipment Detection
equipment-detection.description: Detect and localize industrial equipment (e.g., forklifts) in images using specialized equipment detection models.

models.name: Equipment Detection Model
models.description: A model specifically trained to identify and localize industrial equipment (e.g., forklifts) in various settings.

fire-detection.name: Fire and Smoke Detection
fire-detection.description: Detect and localize fire and smoke in images using specialized fire detection models.

models.name: Fire and Smoke Detection Model
models.description: A model specifically trained to identify and localize fire and smoke in various environments.

cloth-color-classification.name: Cloth Color Classification
cloth-color-classification.description: Classify and identify colors in images using specialized color classification models.

models.name: Cloth Color Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify colors in clothing items.

vehicle-color-classification.name: Vehicle Color Classification
vehicle-color-classification.description: Classify and identify colors of vehicles in images using specialized vehicle color classification models.

models.name: Vehicle Color Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify colors in vehicles.

gender-classification.name: Gender Classification
gender-classification.description: Classify and identify gender of faces in images

models.name: Gender Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify gender of faces in images.

age-classification.name: Age Classification
age-classification.description: Classify and identify age groups of faces in images

models.name: Age Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify age groups of faces in images.

emotion-classification.name: Emotion Classification
emotion-classification.description: Classify and identify emotions of faces in images

models.name: Emotion Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify emotions of faces in images.

face-recognition.name: Face Recognition
face-recognition.description: Recognize and verify identities of faces in images using specialized face recognition models.

models.name: ArcFace
models.description: A state-of-the-art face recognition model that uses deep learning techniques to accurately identify and verify faces in images.

vehicle-make-classification.name: Vehicle Make Classification
vehicle-make-classification.description: Classify and identify brands of vehicles in images using specialized vehicle brand classification models.

models.name: Vehicle Make Classifier
models.description: A model specifically trained to classify and identify different makes of vehicles (e.g., Ford, Toyota, Honda).

human-pose-detection.name: Pose Detection
human-pose-detection.description: Detect and analyze human body poses in images using specialized pose detection models.

models.name: MoveNet
models.description: A fast and accurate pose detection model that identifies key points of the human body in images, enabling real-time pose analysis.

pipeline-end.name: Pipeline End Task
pipeline-end.description: The task that marks the end of the pipeline.

models.name: No model (Pipeline End)
models.description: This task does not use any model as it serves as the endpoint for the pipeline.
